EN: Very good snack bar.The service is very friendly.A variety of hot and cold snacks and wines are available.Although the dishes are separated, they are all freshly made

Original: 不是最正宗的，但我們吃的一切都很美味。一定要留點空間給甜點，起司蛋糕和西班牙油條👌
EN: Not the most authentic, but everything we eat is delicious.Be sure to leave some space for desserts, cheese cakes and Spanish fritters

Original: 令人驚訝的是非常好的小吃和餐酒。非常適合小團體和聚會。
EN: Surprisingly is very good snacks and meals.Very suitable for small groups and gatherings.

Original:
台灣獨特的西班牙酒吧：

—大多數西班牙北部傳統“pinchos”小吃（在馬德里也很受歡迎）

— 它實際上有一個酒吧，您可以坐下來享用飲料和食物，同時與顧客和廚師聊天，這就是西班牙的做法！

除此之外，精選的奇特葡萄酒和 Lolo 的演示營造出非常有趣和輕鬆的氛圍

正如名字一樣：“一毛錢”，很正宗！
EN:
Taiwan's unique Spanish bar:

- Most of the traditional "PINCHOS" snacks in northern Spain (also very popular in Madrid)

- It actually has a bar, you can sit down and enjoy drinks and food, and chat with customers and chefs. This is Spain's approach!

In addition, the demonstration of the selected strange wine and LOLO creates a very interesting and relaxed atmosphere

Just like the name: "one dime", authentic!

Original: 大多數評論似乎都很滿意，但我期望更多和品質。喝了一杯，點了菜單上最熱的tapas，花了1700TWD，我還是很餓。小吃雖小，但應該物有所值。玉米餅是馬鈴薯泥、未煮熟的烤雞。我推薦魷魚。
EN: Most comments seem satisfied, but I hope more and quality.I drank a drink, ordered the hottest TAPAS on the menu, and spent 1700TWD, I was still hungry.Although the snacks are small, it should be worth it.Corn cakes are potato puree and unsustering roast chicken.I recommend squid.

Original: 食物很棒而且很正宗！如果您想享用一頓美味舒適的晚餐，那麼這裡就是您該去的地方。對於大型聚會，他們有私人房間，因此您可以享受陪伴、美食和美酒。所有用於食物的酒和食材都是正宗的，品質優良！強烈推薦！
EN: The food is great and authentic!If you want to enjoy a delicious and comfortable dinner, then this is where you should go.For large gatherings, they have a private room, so you can enjoy companionship, food and wine.All wine and ingredients used for food are authentic and excellent quality!Recommended strongly!

Original:
正宗西班牙菜，必點菜！
當你走進前門時，你會感受到主人的熱情和愛
強烈推薦！
EN:
Authentic Spanish cuisine, you must order!
When you walk into the front door, you will feel the enthusiasm and love of the master
Recommended strongly!

Original: 我們在 Dime 度過了一段愉快的時光。首先也是最重要的，服務非常好，業主也非常好。氣氛舒適而私密，樓上設有酒吧座位、一些桌子和一間後面的房間，樓下有許多方便的開放式座位。我們最喜歡的菜是炸馬鈴薯（patatas bravas？）、所有冷火腿小吃、牛排菲力小吃和伊比利亞豬肉小吃。去年去過聖塞巴斯蒂安，我們特別喜歡Txakoli（獨特的西班牙乾葡萄酒）。在出去的路上，他們提供了免費的威士忌品嚐，只是因為我們對他們的選擇發表了評論。無論是食物、飲料、氣氛或服務，絕對值得一去。
EN: We spent a happy time in Dime.The first and most important, the service is very good, and the owner is very good.The atmosphere is comfortable and private. There are bar seats, some tables and a room behind it upstairs. There are many convenient open seats downstairs.Our favorite dishes are fried potatoes (Patatas Bravas?), All cold ham snacks, steak Fili snacks and Iberian pork snacks.Last year I went to Santy Sebastian, and we especially like TXAKOLI (unique Spanish dried wine).On the way out, they provided free whiskey tasting, just because we comment on their choices.Whether it is food, drinks, atmosphere or services, it is definitely worth visiting.

Original: 舒適的地方，美味的食物和熱情的款待
EN: Comfortable place, delicious food and enthusiastic hospitality

Original: 我來自西班牙，我可以說這家餐廳非常接近真正的西班牙美食。味道和擺盤真的很好。工作人員也很友善。
EN: I am from Spain, and I can say that this restaurant is very close to real Spanish cuisine.Taste and setting are really good.The staff is also very friendly.

非常好。小點心採用優質原料精心製作。

very good.The snacks are carefully made of high -quality raw materials.
